head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ALENCE, EDWARD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ALENCE, EDWARD J.

block.p: ALENCE--Edward J. On May 30, 2004. Former proprietor of Griswald's Pub, the Gallery and the Music Box (all in Bay Ridge, Brooklyn). Past president of the Young Republicans Club. Graduate of Fordham University. Veteran of Special Services of the U.S. Army. Beloved father of Karen Alence. Dearest grandfather of Rachel and Caroline Powers and Eliza Thomas. Loving life partner of Lillian Habib. Fond uncle of Patricia Schapira and Richard Alence. Viewing Tuesday and Wednesday 2-4 and 7-9 PM, Clavin Funeral Home, 7722 Fourth Ave., B'klyn. Mass of Christian Burial Thursday 9 AM, St. Anselm's RC Church. Interment Holy Cross Cemetery. In lieu of flowers memorial donations to be made to St. Jude's Childrens Hospital, 5796 Shelby Oaks Drive, Memphis, TN 38134.
